message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LO, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.CR 

Reasoning: The paper proposes a logical framework for expressing and reasoning about knowledge of explanations, which is relevant to several subfields of computer science. Specifically, the use of epistemic logic and Kripke-style semantics suggests a connection to formal methods in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and logic (cs.LO). The focus on knowing why and scientific explanation may also be of interest to researchers in machine learning (cs.LG) and natural language processing (cs.CL). Finally, the paper's discussion of introspection and model classes may relate to topics in cryptography (cs.CR).
